body_html:
the nvidia-smi result is :
Sat Jun 23 15:45:21 2018
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| NVIDIA-SMI 390.30 Driver Version: 390.30 |
|-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
| GPU Name Persistence-M| Bus-Id Disp.A | Volatile Uncorr. ECC |
| Fan Temp Perf Pwr:Usage/Cap| Memory-Usage | GPU-Util Compute M. |
|===============================+======================+======================|
| 0 GeForce GTX 108... Off | 00000000:00:10.0 Off | N/A |
| 29% 23C P8 15W / 250W | 10MiB / 11178MiB | 0% Default |
+-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+

+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Processes: GPU Memory |
| GPU PID Type Process name Usage |
|=============================================================================|
| No running processes found |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+

and I compile the caffe2 with the command:
cmake -DCUDA_TOOLKIT_ROOT_DIR=/unsullied/sharefs/xiaotianzi/save/cuda-9.0/cuda/ ..
and the LD_LIBRARY_PATH is :
/unsullied/sharefs/xiaotianzi/save/cuda-9.0/cuda/:/unsullied/sharefs/xiaotianzi/save/cuda-9.0/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/lib:/usr/local/nvidia/lib64
